Class AddRemoveGUI

java.lang.Object
  AddRemoveGUI

public class AddRemoveGUI
extends java.lang.Object

The AddRemoveGUI class is a graphic user interface that allows the user to modify the email notification recipients list. The GUI is only avaliable in headful mode.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Stephanie Derosier

Constructor Summary
AddRemoveGUI(EmailNotification emailNot)
          Create an instance of the Add/Remove GUI to add and/or remove recipients from the email notification recipient list
 
Method Summary
 void AddRecip()
          Add a new recipient to the email recipient list.
 void DisplayRecips()
          Display email notification recipients in an immutable table with ability to select one entry at a time
 void RemoveRecip()
          Remove a selected recipient from email recipient list.
 void ShowAddRemoveGUI()
          Creates GUI components (labels, textboxes, buttons) and calls methods necessary to build and display Add/Remove GUI.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

AddRemoveGUI

public AddRemoveGUI(EmailNotification emailNot)
Create an instance of the Add/Remove GUI to add and/or remove recipients from the email notification recipient list

The constructor calls the method to display the GUI

Parameters:
emailNot - workspace plugin object
Method Detail

AddRecip

public void AddRecip()
Add a new recipient to the email recipient list. A name and valid email address must be entered to add recipient to list. The method doesn't check for duplicate entries.

DisplayRecips

public void DisplayRecips()
Display email notification recipients in an immutable table with ability to select one entry at a time

RemoveRecip

public void RemoveRecip()
Remove a selected recipient from email recipient list. Only one recipient may be selected and removed at a time.

ShowAddRemoveGUI

public void ShowAddRemoveGUI()
Creates GUI components (labels, textboxes, buttons) and calls methods necessary to build and display Add/Remove GUI.
